title: Wilmington has it all but one thing. A Popeyes Fried Chicken Restaurant. Will a Popeyes ever open in Wilmington NC?
text:
We're told those plans will only be announced once the restaurant

makes the announcement. So, for now, no, but in the future, we
can't

tell you. But if an announcement is made, we'll report it in the

newspaper and at StarNewsOnline.com.
